directions: Add all ingredients in a large mixing bowl and fold carefully. Use the water from the canned artichokes along with the boiling water.
Place in a 9 x 12 baking dish that has been sprayed with olive oil.
Bake until bubbling and golden brown.
ingredients: 1 (4.1 ounce) package Idahoan® Roasted Garlic & Parmesan Baby Reds
2 (15 ounce) cans water packed artichoke hearts
1 cup Brie cheese, broken into chunks
title: Buttery Crab and Artichoke Dip
